Uses of Interface
zebra4j.util.Randomness

Packages that use Randomness
Package
Description
zebra4j
zebra4j is a generator and solver for Zebra puzzles, a type of "logic grid puzzles".
zebra4j.util
Java utilities, mainly for data, which are not specific to zebra4j
